OptionsHeading.description: The heading displayed above the options on the management panel.

OptionLabelRequired.description: The message displayed on a required option if the option does not have a value.

OptionLabelMinimum.message: The minimum value for this option is
OptionLabelMinimum.description: The message displayed on an option if the value is less than the minimum required value.

OptionLabelMaximum.message: The maximum value for this option is
OptionLabelMaximum.description: The message displayed on an option if the value is greater than the maximum required value.

OptionManagementPanelTypeDescription.message: Specifies where/how the main management panel is displayed when clicking the DeviantArt Filter logo in the address bar.

OptionManagementPanelTypeValueTab.message: Open in a new tab in the current window
OptionManagementPanelTypeValueTab.description: The label for the value of the Management Panel Type option that corresponds to using a new browser tab.

OptionManagementPanelTypeValueWindow.message: Open in a a new popup window
OptionManagementPanelTypeValueWindow.description: The label for the value of the Management Panel Type option that corresponds to using a new browser window.

OptionMetadataBatchSizeDescription.message: Specifies the number of deviations for which to load metadata at a time. Setting this value to a lower number may improve browsing performance.

OptionMetadataCacheTTLName.message: Number of Days to Cache Metadata

OptionMetadataCacheTTLDescription.message: Specifies the number of days to cache metadata (for tags and categories) locally for deviations. Set this value to disable local caching completely.

OptionMetadataDebugDescription.message: When enabled, deviation thumbnails with missing metadata (for tags and categories) have a red outline, and deviations with metadata have a green outline. This is primarily for debugging, but can be a neat visual for curious people.

OptionPlaceholdersDescription.message: When enabled, a placeholder image is displayed instead of the actual thumbnail for filtered deviations. Disable this setting to completely remove filtered deviation thumbnails.

OptionPrivateStorageDescription.message: This option determines if filters that are created in normal browsing mode are available while in Private/Incognito mode.

OptionPrivateStorageValueRead.message: Yes, but do NOT save changes

OptionUpdateError.message: An error occurred while updating the $OPTION$ option: $ERROR$
OptionUpdateError.description: The error message displayed if an option fails to update correctly.
